[#soil-coarse-fragment-alteration_result-value]
====== Result value

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:soil-plot-soil-description-protocol-shapes:soil-coarse-fragment-alteration:result-value`
|Label | Result value
|Definition | The value of `rdf:value` _MUST_ exist in the Soils coarse frag alterations codes controlled vocabulary.
|Comment | The value in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ be a value in `sh:in`, which is the Soils coarse frag alterations codes controlled vocabulary.
include::../../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

|Property | Value
|Controlled list items | The result value MUST be from the following list: 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/77eb0db7-56bc-5cdf-b1ef-aae71c3d2e9c[`Calcified`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/b26a2654-ee52-51a8-ac60-6bebb9254e0e[`Ferruginised`]

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/05bf64f4-0b39-5580-a3a4-9b5fedbf6c18[`Other`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/e86c891d-41c6-599b-96e7-c8cbffe5913f[`Silicified`]
